about_the_game:
Immerse yourself in the exciting game for the attentive Find Colibries! In this thrilling adventure game, you will have to search for hummingbirds on randomly generated maps full of mysteries and secrets. Explore dense forests, uncover ancient secrets, and find these beautiful birds.
Ready for an unforgettable journey? Find all the hummingbirds and become a true explorer of the Aztec jungles!
You have at your disposal a versatile level generator with the following capabilities:

  • Map size management
  • Cloudiness settings
  • Changing the number of birds on the map
  • Number of hidden birds
  • Map color scheme

Create unique adventures, test and perfect your searching skills in this mystical world!
detailed_description:
Immerse yourself in the exciting game for the attentive Find Colibries! In this thrilling adventure game, you will have to search for hummingbirds on randomly generated maps full of mysteries and secrets. Explore dense forests, uncover ancient secrets, and find these beautiful birds.
Ready for an unforgettable journey? Find all the hummingbirds and become a true explorer of the Aztec jungles!
You have at your disposal a versatile level generator with the following capabilities:

  • Map size management
  • Cloudiness settings
  • Changing the number of birds on the map
  • Number of hidden birds
  • Map color scheme

Create unique adventures, test and perfect your searching skills in this mystical world!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 or later
  • Processor: 1.8 ghz dual core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: integrated Graphics
  • Storage: 320 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X
  • Processor: 1.8 ghz dual core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: integrated Graphics
  • Storage: 320 MB available space

short_description: Test your attentiveness in the captivating world of Aztec jungles in the game Find Colibries and find all the hidden birds!
